General.Name: Create Technology & Science Co Ltd
General.Description: Create Technology & Science Co.,Ltd. engages in manufacturing, engineering, and sale of precision machinery and environmental protection equipment in China and internationally. It also offers environmental protection and high-voltage porcelain insulators for power transmission and transformation. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
